<!-- Hello -->
|vo_01_01_title_s    = 初次见面…
|vo_01_01_title_t    = 初次見面…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx_s       = 如遇失道旷野之难，路遭贼人之难，水火刀兵之难，鬼神药毒之难，恶兽毒虫之难，冤家恶人之难，便呼我名。<br />「三眼五显仙人」&mdash;&mdash;「魈」，听召前来守护。
|vo_01_01_tx_t       = 如遇失道曠野之難，路遭賊人之難，水火刀兵之難，鬼神藥毒之難，惡獸毒蟲之難，冤家惡人之難，便呼我名。<br />「三眼五顯仙人」&mdash;&mdash;「魈」，聽召前來守護。
|vo_01_01_rm         = Rú yù shī dào kuàngyě zhī nán, lù zāo zéirén zhī nán, shuǐhuǒ dāobīng zhī nán, guǐshén yào dú zhī nán, èshòu dúchóng zhī nán, yuānjiā èrén zhī nán, biàn hū wǒ míng.<br />"Sānyǎn Wǔxiǎn Xiānrén" {{lmdash}} "Xiāo", tīng zhào qián lái shǒuhù.
|vo_01_01_tl         = If you encounter the trouble of losing your direction in the wilderness, the trouble of meeting thieves, the trouble of swordsmen of water and fire, the trouble of spirits and poison, the trouble of evil beasts and poisonous insects, the trouble of malicious enemies, then call my name.<br />"The Mighty and Illuminated Adepti" [lit. Three Eyes, Five Manifestations Illuminated Immortal] &mdash; "Xiao," here by your command.

<!-- Chats -->
|vo_02_01_title_s    = 闲聊・闲散
|vo_02_01_title_t    = 閒聊・閒散
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Idleness
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Idleness.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx_s       = 我居然沦落到如此闲散的地步，可笑。
|vo_02_01_tx_t       = 我居然淪落到如此閒散的地步，可笑。
|vo_02_01_rm         = Wǒ jūrán lúnluò dào rúcǐ xiánsǎn de dìbù, kěxiào.
|vo_02_01_tl         = Actually reduced to a point of being idle, ridiculous.

|vo_02_02_title_s    = 闲聊・荒魂
|vo_02_02_title_t    = 閒聊・荒魂
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Wandering Spirits
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Wandering Spirits.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx_s       = 荒野上的孤魂，休想伤我分毫。
|vo_02_02_tx_t       = 荒野上的孤魂，休想傷我分毫。
|vo_02_02_rm         = Huāngyě shàng de gūhún, xiūxiǎng shāng wǒ fēnháo.
|vo_02_02_tl         = The wilderness' lonely spirits would never imagine as to lay even a single finger on me.

|vo_02_03_title_s    = 闲聊・侵蚀
|vo_02_03_title_t    = 閒聊・侵蝕
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Corruption
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Corruption.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx_s       = …呃啊…哼，想起了一些不愉快的事。
|vo_02_03_tx_t       = …呃啊…哼，想起了一些不愉快的事。
|vo_02_03_rm         = ...È a... Hēng, xiǎngqǐle yīxiē bùyúkuài de shì.
|vo_02_03_tl         = ...Agh... Hmph, remembered some unpleasant memories.

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title_s    = 下雨的时候…
|vo_03_01_title_t    = 下雨的時候…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx_s       = 魔物不会因为下雨就休息。我们走。
|vo_03_01_tx_t       = 魔物不會因為下雨就休息。我們走。
|vo_03_01_rm         = Mówù bùhuì yīnwèi xiàyǔ jiù xiūxí. Wǒmen zǒu.
|vo_03_01_tl         = Monsters will not rest because of the rain. Let us move.

|vo_03_02_title_s    = 雨过天晴…
|vo_03_02_title_t    = 雨過天晴…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = After the Rain
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx_s       = 天晴了？哼，我不关心天气。
|vo_03_02_tx_t       = 天晴了？哼，我不關心天氣。
|vo_03_02_rm         = Tiān qíngle? Hēng, wǒ bù guānxīn tiānqì.
|vo_03_02_tl         = The weather has cleared? Hmph, I don't concern myself with the weather.

|vo_03_03_title_s    = 打雷的时候…
|vo_03_03_title_t    = 打雷的時候…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx_s       = 不少凡人害怕打雷。无法理解，这分明很寻常。
|vo_03_03_tx_t       = 不少凡人害怕打雷。無法理解，這明明很尋常。
|vo_03_03_rm_s       = Bùshǎo fánrén hàipà dǎléi. Wúfǎ lǐjiě, zhè fēnmíng hěn xúncháng.
|vo_03_03_rm_t       = 
|vo_03_03_tl         = Many mortals fear thunder. This I cannot understand, this occurrence is clearly so common.

|vo_03_04_title_s    = 下雪的时候…
|vo_03_04_title_t    = 下雪的時候…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx_s       = 雪积起来之后，就可以挖着吃了。
|vo_03_04_tx_t       = 雪積起來之後，就可以挖著吃了。
|vo_03_04_rm         = Xuě jīqǐlái zhīhòu, jiù kěyǐ wāzhe chīle.
|vo_03_04_tl         = After the snow accumulates, it can be dug up and eaten.

<!-- Greetings -->
|vo_04_01_title_s    = 早上好…
|vo_04_01_title_t    = 早安…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx_s       = 时候不早了。出发吧。
|vo_04_01_tx_t       = 時候不早了。出發吧。
|vo_04_01_rm         = Shíhòu bù zǎole. Chūfā ba.
|vo_04_01_tl         = It's not early. Let's depart.

|vo_04_02_title_s    = 中午好…
|vo_04_02_title_t    = 午安…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx_s       = 午餐…回望舒客栈吧。
|vo_04_02_tx_t       = 午餐…回望舒客棧吧。
|vo_04_02_rm         = Wǔcān... huí Wàngshū Kèzhàn ba.
|vo_04_02_tl         = Lunch... let's return to Wangshu Inn.

|vo_04_03_title_s    = 晚上好…
|vo_04_03_title_t    = 晚上好…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx_s       = 夜晚，不祥之物最易骚动。你最好别出门。
|vo_04_03_tx_t       = 夜晚，不祥之物最易騷動。{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}最好別出門。
|vo_04_03_rm         = Yèwǎn, bùxiáng zhī wù zuì yì sāodòng. Nǐ zuì hǎo bié chūmén.
|vo_04_03_tl         = Night is when sinister creatures are most likely to cause disturbances. You best not go outside.

|vo_04_04_title_s    = 晚安…
|vo_04_04_title_t    = 晚安…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx_s       = 你去吧，我会在这里等你。
|vo_04_04_tx_t       = {{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}去吧，我會在這裡等{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}。
|vo_04_04_rm         = Nǐ qù ba, wǒ huì zài zhèlǐ děng nǐ.
|vo_04_04_tl         = Go, I will be waiting for you here.

<!-- About Xiao -->
|vo_05_01_title_s    = 关于{name_s}自己・非人
|vo_05_01_title_t    = 關於{name_t}自己・非人
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Inhuman
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Inhuman.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx_s       = 我并非人类，不太能够理解人类的感情。
|vo_05_01_tx_t       = 我並非人類，不太能夠理解人類的感情。
|vo_05_01_rm         = Wǒ bìngfēi rénlèi, bù tài nénggòu lǐjiě rénlèi de gǎnqíng.
|vo_05_01_tl         = I am not human; I can't really understand the emotions of humans.

|vo_05_02_title_s    = 关于{name_s}自己・璃月
|vo_05_02_title_t    = 關於{name_t}自己・璃月
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Liyue
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Liyue.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx_s       = 近来璃月变化得过于迅速了…呵，罢了，我也没打算适应。
|vo_05_02_tx_t       = 近來璃月變化得過於迅速了…呵，罷了，我也沒打算適應。
|vo_05_02_rm         = Jìnlái Líyuè biànhuà dé guòyú xùnsùle... Hē, bàle, wǒ yě méi dǎsuàn shìyìng.
|vo_05_02_tl         = The recent Liyue's changes have been excessively quick... Ha, forget it, I don't plan on adapting.

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_06_01_title_s    = 关于我们・警示
|vo_06_01_title_t    = 關於我們・警示
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Warnings
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Warnings.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx_s       = 如果有一天，连你也陷入了黑暗。就由我来&mdash;&mdash;
|vo_06_01_tx_t       = 如果有一天，連{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}也陷入了黑暗。就由我來&mdash;&mdash;
|vo_06_01_rm         = Rúguǒ yǒu yītiān, lián nǐ yě xiànrùle hēi'àn. Jiù yóu wǒ lái{{lmdash}}
|vo_06_01_tl         = If there is a day where even you have fallen into darkness, then it will be up to me.

|vo_06_02_title_s    = 关于我们・信任
|vo_06_02_title_t    = 關於我們・信任
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Trust
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Trust.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx_s       = 别被污染，我不会留情的。<br />…我是说，既然是「你」，「你」应该能够保持坚定。
|vo_06_02_tx_t       = 別被污染，我不會留情的。<br />…我是說，既然是「{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}」，「{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}」應該能夠保持堅定。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Bié bèi wūrǎn, wǒ bùhuì liúqíng de.<br />...Wǒ shì shuō, jìrán shì "nǐ", "nǐ" yīnggāi nénggòu bǎochí jiāndìng.
|vo_06_02_tl         = Do not become corrupted, I will not have mercy.<br />...What I'm saying is, if it is "you," then "you" should be able to stay firm.

|vo_06_03_title_s    = 关于我们・犯困
|vo_06_03_title_t    = 關於我們・犯睏
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Drowsiness
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Drowsiness.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx_s       = …谁！？…你觉得我是站着睡着了？哼，不敬仙师！
|vo_06_03_tx_t       = …誰！？…{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}覺得我是站著睡著了？哼，不敬仙師！
|vo_06_03_rm         = ...Shéi!? ...Nǐ juéde wǒ shì zhànzhe shuìzháole? Hēng, bùjìng xiān shī!
|vo_06_03_tl         = ...Who!? ...You think I had fallen asleep standing? Hmph, disrespect toward the adepti!

|vo_06_04_title_s    = 关于我们・海灯节
|vo_06_04_title_t    = 關於我們・海燈節
|vo_06_04_subtitle   = About Us: Lantern Rite
|vo_06_04_friendship = 6
|vo_06_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Lantern Rite.ogg
|vo_06_04_tx_s       = 海灯节？哼，原来又到了凡人用发光垃圾塞满璃月港的时候了，唉，为何如此幼稚。<br />不过你若无聊，我便陪你去。
|vo_06_04_tx_t       = 海燈節？哼，原來又到了凡人用發光垃圾塞滿璃月港的時候了，唉，為何如此幼稚。<br />不過{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}若無聊，我便陪{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}去。
|vo_06_04_rm         = Hǎidēngjié? Hēng, yuánlái yòu dàole fánrén yòng fāguāng lājī sāi mǎn Líyuè-gǎng de shíhòule, āi, wèihé rúcǐ yòuzhì.<br />Bùguò nǐ ruò wúliáo, wǒ biàn péi nǐ qù.
|vo_06_04_tl         = The Lantern Rite? Hmph, so it is once again the time where mortals bestrew Liyue Harbor with their glowing trash, ugh, why so childish.<br />But if you're bored, I can accompany you there.

<!-- Miscellany I -->
|vo_07_01_title_s    = 关于「神之眼」・欲望
|vo_07_01_title_t    = 關於「神之眼」・欲望
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]: Desires
|vo_07_01_friendship = 3
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision - Desires.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx_s       = 「神之眼」、欲望？呵…不要用凡人的标准来揣测仙人，我没有欲望。
|vo_07_01_tx_t       = 「神之眼」、欲望？呵…不要用凡人的標準來揣測仙人，我沒有欲望。
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Shénzhīyǎn", yùwàng? Hē... bùyào yòng fánrén de biāozhǔn lái chuǎicè xiānrén, wǒ méiyǒu yùwàng.
|vo_07_01_tl         = "Vision," desires? Hah... do not use mortal standards to consider adepti, I do not have desires.

|vo_07_02_title_s    = 关于「神之眼」・理由
|vo_07_02_title_t    = 關於「神之眼」・理由
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]: Reasons
|vo_07_02_friendship = 5
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision - Reasons.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx_s       = 并不是有意隐瞒。我的欲望，不应对外人讲。<br />人间不是有着愿望说出口就会失效的规矩…呃，不是一回事？
|vo_07_02_tx_t       = 並不是有意隱瞞。我的欲望，不應對外人講。<br />人間不是有著願望說出口就會失效的規矩…呃，不是真的？
|vo_07_02_rm_s       = Bìng bùshì yǒuyì yǐnmán. Wǒ de yùwàng, bù yìngduì wàirén jiǎng.<br />Rénjiān bùshì yǒuzhe yuànwàng shuō chūkǒu jiù huì shīxiào de guījǔ... è, bùshì yì huí shì?
|vo_07_02_rm_t       = 
|vo_07_02_tl         =

|vo_07_03_title_s    = 有什么想要分享…
|vo_07_03_title_t    = 有什麼想要分享…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Anything to Share
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx_s       = 杀戮是我的强项。如果你下不去手，就叫我来。
|vo_07_03_tx_t       = 殺戮是我的強項。如果{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}下不了手，就叫我來。
|vo_07_03_rm         = Shālù shì wǒ de qiángxiàng. Rúguǒ nǐ xiàbúqù shǒu, jiù jiào wǒ lái.
|vo_07_03_tl         = Killing is my strength. If you cannot do it, call for me.

|vo_07_04_title_s    = 感兴趣的见闻…
|vo_07_04_title_t    = 感興趣的見聞…
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx_s       = 荻花洲，曾经一度荒芜。<br />虽然，是过去好多年…不，好几百年的事了。
|vo_07_04_tx_t       = 荻花洲，曾經一度荒蕪。<br />雖然，是過去好多年…不，好幾百年的事了。
|vo_07_04_rm         = Díhuā-zhōu, céngjīng yīdù huāngwú.<br />Suīrán, shì guòqù hǎoduō nián... bù, hǎojǐbǎi nián de shìle.
|vo_07_04_tl         = Dihua Islet, once desolate.<br />Though, that was many years... no, many hundreds of years ago.

<!-- About Others -->
|vo_08_01_title_s    = 关于钟离…
|vo_08_01_title_t    = 關於鍾離…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Zhongli]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx_s       = 嗯…打听一下。请问钟离大人平日里都在…呃，遛鸟？赏花？品鉴古玩？<br />…钟离大人做这些，是有什么深意…
|vo_08_01_tx_t       = 嗯…打聽一下。請問鍾離大人平日裡都在…呃，遛鳥？賞花？品鑒古玩？<br />…鍾離大人做這些，是有什麼深意…
|vo_08_01_rm         = Ǹg... dǎtīng yíxià. Qǐngwèn Zhōnglí-dàrén píngrìlǐ dōu zài... è, liùniǎo? Shǎng huā? Pǐn jiàn gǔwàn?<br />...Zhōnglí-dàrén zuò zhèxiē, shì yǒu shénme shēnyì...
|vo_08_01_tl         = Um... let me ask, on a typical day, what does Master Zhongli... uh, birdwatching? Flower viewing? Antique appraising?<br />...Master Zhongli doing these things, what could the purpose be...

|vo_08_02_title_s    = 关于北斗…
|vo_08_02_title_t    = 關於北斗…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx_s       = 北斗吗？我与她没有什么交情。不过，冥海巨兽确有其事。能够将「海山」击败，作为人类，她的实力值得肯定。
|vo_08_02_tx_t       = 北斗嗎？我與她沒有什麼交情。不過，冥海巨獸確有其事。能夠將「海山」擊敗，作為人類，她的實力值得肯定。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Běidǒu ma? Wǒ yǔ tā méiyǒu shénme jiāoqing. Bùguò, míng hǎi jù shòu què yǒu qí shì. Nénggòu jiāng "Hǎishān" jíbài, zuòwéi rénlèi, tā de shílì zhídé kěndìng.
|vo_08_02_tl         = Beidou? I have no relationship with her. Although, sea monsters do exist. Being able to defeat Haishan as a human, her strength is commendable.

|vo_08_03_title_s    = 关于白术…
|vo_08_03_title_t    = 關於白术…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Baizhu]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Baizhu.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx_s       = 你想…托付白术研制缓解我痛苦的药物？呵…你的好意我心领了。凡人的药物，对仙人是无法起效的。
|vo_08_03_tx_t       = {{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}想…託付白朮研製緩解我痛苦的藥物？呵…{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}的好意我心領了。凡人的藥物，對仙人是無法作用的。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Nǐ xiǎng... tuōfù Báizhú yánzhì huǎnjiě wǒ tòngkǔ de yàowù? Hē... nǐ de hǎoyì wǒ xīnlǐngle. Fánrén de yàowù, duì xiānrén shì wúfǎ qǐ xiào de.
|vo_08_03_tl         = You want to... get Baizhu to create medicine that will relieve my suffering? Heh... I appreciate your good intentions. Mortal medicine is incapable of affecting adepti.

|vo_08_04_title_s    = 关于胡桃…
|vo_08_04_title_t    = 關於胡桃…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Hu Tao]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Hu Tao.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx_s       = 胡桃？那孩子，活泼到令人头疼。所幸她还算风趣，不必担心会成长为无趣的人类。
|vo_08_04_tx_t       = 胡桃？那孩子，活潑到令人頭疼。所幸她還算風趣，不必擔心會成長為無趣的人類。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Hú Táo? Nà háizi, huópō dào lìngrén tóuténg. Suǒxìng tā hái suàn fēngqù, bùbì dānxīn huì chéngzhǎng wéi wúqù de rénlèi.
|vo_08_04_tl         = Hu Tao? That child, so lively that it causes headaches. Fortunately she can be considered humorous, no need to worry that she will grow to become a boring human.

|vo_08_05_title_s    = 关于温迪…
|vo_08_05_title_t    = 關於溫迪…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Venti]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Venti.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx_s       = 温迪…？原来如此，名字叫作温迪啊。他演奏的曲调…不，没什么。
|vo_08_05_tx_t       = 溫迪…？原來如此，名字叫作溫迪啊。他演奏的曲調…不，沒什麼。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Wēndí...? Yuánlái rúcǐ, míngzǐ jiào zuò Wēndí a. Tā yǎnzòu de qǔdiào... bù, méishénme.
|vo_08_05_tl         = Venti...? So that's how it is, his name is Venti. The songs he performs... no, nothing.

|vo_08_06_title_s    = 关于甘雨…
|vo_08_06_title_t    = 關於甘雨…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Ganyu]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Ganyu.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx_s       = 甘雨既非仙兽，又非凡人，游走于仙人两界，靠着职责支撑自我，困惑是免不了的。...<!-- In-game text. -->你说，我？呵，要让只懂杀戮与生存之道的夜叉，去开导瑞兽？天方夜谭。
|vo_08_06_tx_t       = 甘雨既非仙獸，又非凡人，游走於仙人兩界，靠著職責支撐自我，困惑是免不了的。…{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}說，我？呵，要讓只懂殺戮與生存之道的夜叉，去開導瑞獸？天方夜譚。
|vo_08_06_rm         = Gānyǔ jì fēi xiānshòu, yòu fēi fánrén, yóu zǒu yú xiānrén liǎng jiè, kàozhe zhízé zhīchēng zìwǒ, kùnhuò shì miǎnbuliǎo de. ...Nǐ shuō, wǒ? Hē, yào ràng zhǐ dǒng shālù yǔ shēngcún zhīdào de yèchā, qù kāidǎo ruìshòu? Tiānfāngyètán.
|vo_08_06_tl         = Ganyu is not an illuminated beast, but nor is she a mortal, traversing the worlds of both adepti and humans, relying on her duty to support herself, confusion is inevitable... You ask, me? Heh... wanting a Yaksha who only knows of killing and surviving to be a guide to the beast?<ref group="TN •" name="About Ganyu I">Refers to five specific beasts: the dragon, phoenix, turtle, qilin (Ganyu), and pixiu.</ref> That idea of yours will stay a work of fiction.<ref group="TN •" name="About Ganyu II">{{Lang|mini=1|zh=天方夜谭|zh_rm=Tiānfāngyètán}} is another name for the collection of folktales ''{{w|One Thousand and One Nights}}'', commonly known in English as ''Arabian Nights''. Its literal meaning is {{Lang|mini=1|zh=天方|zh_tl=(referring to) Arabia}}+{{Lang|mini=1|zh=夜谭|zh_tl=night chats,}} and it is used to express that something that is ridiculous and would never happen.</ref>

|vo_08_07_title_s    = 关于申鹤…
|vo_08_07_title_t    = 關於申鶴…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Shenhe]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_quest      = The Crane Returns on the Wind
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shenhe.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx_s       = 申鹤似乎对你颇为信赖。…也是。毕竟，世间难得几人能有你这般的善心与热忱。
|vo_08_07_tx_t       = 申鶴似乎對{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}頗為信賴。…也是。畢竟，世間難得幾人能有{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}這般的善心與熱忱。
|vo_08_07_rm         = Shēnhè sìhū duì nǐ pǒ wéi xìnlài. ...Yěshì. Bìjìng, shìjiān nándé jǐ rén néng yǒu nǐ zhè bān de shànxīn yǔ rèchén.
|vo_08_07_tl         = Shenhe seems to have considerable trust in you. ...It makes sense. After all, in this world it's hard to come across people like you who have such kindness and ardor.

|vo_08_08_title_s    = 关于夜兰…
|vo_08_08_title_t    = 關於夜蘭…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Yelan]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yelan.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx_s       = 我听说她曾调查千岩军在层岩巨渊的相关痕迹。孤身追查秘密，想来也是有点本事的人。
|vo_08_08_tx_t       = 我聽說她曾調查千岩軍在層岩巨淵的相關痕跡。孤身追查秘密，想來也是有點本事的人。
|vo_08_08_rm_s       = Wǒ tīngshuō tā céng diàochá Qiānyán-jūn zài Céngyán Jùyuān de xiāngguān hénjì. Gūshēn zhuīchá mìmì, xiǎnglái yěshì yǒudiǎn běnshì de rén.
|vo_08_08_rm_t       = Wǒ tīngshuō tā céng diàochá Qiānyán-jūn zài Céngyán Jùyuān de xiāngguān hénjī. Gūshēn zhuīchá mìmì, xiǎnglái yěshì yǒudiǎn běnshì de rén.
|vo_08_08_tl         = I heard that she once investigated the related movements of the Millelith within the Chasm. Pursuing secrets alone, she must be quite the capable person.

<!-- More About Xiao -->
|vo_09_01_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其一
|vo_09_01_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其一
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx_s       = 我会为你护法。<br />但是…别靠近我，别妨碍我。否则，你会后悔的。
|vo_09_01_tx_t       = 我會為{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}護法。<br />但是…別靠近我，別妨礙我。否則，{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}會後悔的。
|vo_09_01_rm         = Wǒ huì wèi nǐ hùfǎ.<br />Dànshì... bié kàojìn wǒ, bié fáng'ài wǒ. Fǒuzé, nǐ huì hòuhuǐ de.
|vo_09_01_tl         = I will be your guardian.<br />But... don't get close to me, and don't hinder me. Or else, you will regret it.

|vo_09_02_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其二
|vo_09_02_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其二
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx_s       = 在这千年以来，我猎杀过数以万计的怨魂。不想惹上麻烦，就离我远点。把我当作「工具」就好。
|vo_09_02_tx_t       = 在這千年以來，我獵殺過數以萬計的怨魂。不想惹上麻煩，就離我遠點。把我當作「工具」就好。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Zài zhè qiānnián yǐlái, wǒ liè shāguò shù yǐ wàn jì de yuàn hún. Bùxiǎng rě shàng máfan, jiù lí wǒ yuǎn diǎn. Bǎ wǒ dàng zuò "gōngjù" jiù hǎo.
|vo_09_02_tl         = Through these thousands of years, I have killed tens of thousands of resenting spirits. If you don't want trouble to arise, stay away from me. See me as just a tool.

|vo_09_03_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其三
|vo_09_03_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其三
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx_s       = 「它们」的声音…常常在我的耳边出现。咆哮、号哭…嘶喊着杀戮…<br />这是我自己的选择和自己的报应。与你无关。
|vo_09_03_tx_t       = 「它們」的聲音…常常在我的耳邊出現。咆哮、號哭…嘶喊著殺戮…<br />這是我自己的選擇和自己的報應。與{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}無關。
|vo_09_03_rm         = "Tāmen" de shēngyīn... chángcháng zài wǒ de ěr biān chūxiàn. Páoxiāo, háokū... sīhǎnzhe shālù...<br />Zhè shì wǒ zìjǐ de xuǎnzé hé zìjǐ de bàoyìng. Yǔ nǐ wúguān.
|vo_09_03_tl         = "Their" voices... are often present by my ear. Roars, cries... shrieks about slaughter...<br />This is my choice and my retribution. It has nothing to do with you.

|vo_09_04_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其四
|vo_09_04_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其四
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx_s       = 摩拉克斯？关于这个名字，你究竟知道多少？<br />他是赐予我「魈」之名之人，将我从漫长的痛苦中解放。<br />胆敢对他不敬的话。即使是你，我也不会原谅。
|vo_09_04_tx_t       = 摩拉克斯？關於這個名字，{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}究竟知道多少？<br />他是賜予我「魈」之名之人，將我從漫長的痛苦中解放。<br />膽敢對他不敬的話。即使是{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}，我也不會原諒。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Mólākèsī? Guānyú zhège míngzì, nǐ jiùjìng zhīdào duōshǎo?<br />Tā shì cìyǔ wǒ "Xiāo" zhī míng zhī rén, jiāng wǒ cóng màncháng de tòngkǔ zhōng jiěfàng.<br />Dǎn gǎn duì tā bújìng dehuà. Jíshǐ shì nǐ, wǒ yě bùhuì yuánliàng.
|vo_09_04_tl         = Morax? Exactly how much do you know concerning this name?<br />He granted me the name "Xiao" and released me from my endless suffering.<br />Dare to speak disrespectfully towards him, and even you I will not forgive.

|vo_09_05_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其五
|vo_09_05_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其五
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx_s       = 已经迟了。我们之间的关联已经太多了。即使你想要放弃，也来不及了吧。嗯？没有这样想过？<br />…「靖妖傩舞」，我的战斗是不会停下的。<br />但是，关于你的事情，我想了解更多。
|vo_09_05_tx_t       = 已經遲了。我們之間的關聯已經太多了。即使{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}想要放棄，也來不及了吧。嗯？沒有這樣想過？<br />…「靖妖儺舞」，我的戰鬥是不會停下的。<br />但是，關於{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}的事情，我想瞭解更多。
|vo_09_05_rm         = Yǐjīng chíle. Wǒmen zhījiān de guānlián yǐjīng tài duōle. Jíshǐ nǐ xiǎngyào fàngqì, yě láibujíle ba. Ǹg? Méiyǒu zhèyàng xiǎngguò?<br />..."Jìng yāo nuó wǔ", wǒ de zhàndòu shì bùhuì tíngxià de.<br />Dànshì, guānyú nǐ de shìqíng, wǒ xiǎng liǎojiě gèngduō.
|vo_09_05_tl         =

<!-- Miscellany II -->
|vo_10_01_title_s    = {name_s}的爱好…
|vo_10_01_title_t    = {name_t}的愛好…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx_s       = 你还真是胆量不小，有勇气询问我的爱好。<br />那便来战吧。以你的身躯，扛得住我几招呢？
|vo_10_01_tx_t       = {{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}還真是膽量不小，有勇氣詢問我的愛好。<br />那便來戰吧。以{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}的身軀，扛得住我幾招呢？
|vo_10_01_rm         = Nǐ hái zhēn shì dǎnliàng bù xiǎo, yǒu yǒngqì xúnwèn wǒ de àihào.<br />Nà biàn lái zhàn ba. Yǐ nǐ de shēnqū, kángdézhù wǒ jǐ zhāo ne?
|vo_10_01_tl         = Your courage is in no short supply, daring to ask me about my hobbies.<br />Then, let's fight. How many blows will you be able to withstand?

|vo_10_02_title_s    = {name_s}的烦恼…
|vo_10_02_title_t    = {name_t}的煩惱…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx_s       = 烦恼？呵…这个问题对仙人毫无意义，没有什么烦恼能够存在千年。
|vo_10_02_tx_t       = 煩惱？呵…這個問題對仙人毫無意義，沒有什麼煩惱能夠存在千年。
|vo_10_02_rm         = Fánnǎo? Hē... zhège wèntí duì xiānrén háo wú yìyì, méiyǒu shénme fánnǎo nénggòu cúnzài qiānnián.
|vo_10_02_tl         = Troubles? Heh... this question is meaningless to adepti, there are no troubles that can endure through a thousand years.

|vo_10_03_title_s    = 喜欢的食物・杏仁豆腐
|vo_10_03_title_t    = 喜歡的食物・杏仁豆腐
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food: Almond Tofu
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food - Almond Tofu.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx_s       = 我对人间的食物并无兴致。烹饪繁琐，等待漫长。唯独杏仁豆腐，勉强可以入口。
|vo_10_03_tx_t       = 我對人間的食物並無興致。烹飪繁瑣，等待漫長。唯獨杏仁豆腐，勉強可以入口。
|vo_10_03_rm         = Wǒ duì rénjiān de shíwù bìng wú xìngzhì. Pēngrèn fánsuǒ, děngdài màncháng. Wéi dú xìngrén dòufu, miǎnqiáng kěyǐ rùkǒu.
|vo_10_03_tl         = I have no interest towards human food. Dull cooking, long waits. Almond Tofu alone is what I can force down.

|vo_10_04_title_s    = 喜欢的食物・回忆
|vo_10_04_title_t    = 喜歡的食物・回憶
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Favorite Food: Memories
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food - Memories.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx_s       = 杏仁豆腐的味道，和「美梦」非常相似呢。
|vo_10_04_tx_t       = 杏仁豆腐的味道，和「美夢」非常相似呢。
|vo_10_04_rm         = Xìngrén dòufu de wèidào, hé "měimèng" fēicháng xiāngsì ne.
|vo_10_04_tl         = The taste of Almond Tofu is very similar to "Sweet Dreams."

|vo_10_05_title_s    = 讨厌的食物…
|vo_10_05_title_t    = 討厭的食物…
|vo_10_05_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_05_tx_s       = 要我亲手在薄饼中包入肉片？啊…然后…一起吃下去？呵…麻烦。如今的人间，真是越来越缺乏常识了。
|vo_10_05_tx_t       = 要我親手在薄餅中包入肉片？啊…然後…一起吃下去？呵…麻煩。如今的人間，真是越來越缺乏常識了。
|vo_10_05_rm         = Yào wǒ qīnshǒu zài báobǐng zhōng bāorù ròupiàn? A... ránhòu... yīqǐ chīxiàqù? Hē... máfan. Rújīn de rénjiān, zhēn shì yuèláiyuè quēfá chángshìle.
|vo_10_05_tl         = I have to wrap slices of meat in a pancake? Ah... then... eat it altogether? Hah... bothersome. Humans are lacking more and more common sense.

<!-- Birthday -->
|vo_12_01_title_s    = 生日…
|vo_12_01_title_t    = 生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx_s       = 诞生的时日…人类的这些纪念，真是冗余。嗯…等着。我给你折一只梧桐树叶蝴蝶。<br />好了，拿去吧。这是仙法，可以辟邪。
|vo_12_01_tx_t       = 誕生的時日…人類的這些紀念，真是冗餘。嗯…等著。我為{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}摺一隻梧桐樹葉蝴蝶。<br />好了，拿去吧。這是仙法，可以避邪。
|vo_12_01_rm         = Dànshēng de shí rì... rénlèi de zhèxiē jìniàn, zhēnshi rǒngyú. Ǹg... děngzhe. Wǒ gěi nǐ zhé yī zhǐ wútóng shùyè húdié.<br />Hǎole, ná qù ba. Zhè shì xiānfǎ, kěyǐ bìxié.
|vo_12_01_tl         = The date of your birth... these types of human commemorations are redundant. Ahem... wait. I have a butterfly folded from sycamore leaves for you.<br />Alright, take it. This is adeptal magic and can ward off evil spirits.

<!-- Feelings About Ascension -->
|vo_13_01_title_s    = 突破的感受・起
|vo_13_01_title_t    = 突破的感受・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings about Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx_s       = 只是这种程度而已。没什么值得大惊小怪的。
|vo_13_01_tx_t       = 只是這種程度而已。沒什麼值得大驚小怪的。
|vo_13_01_rm         = Zhǐshì zhè zhǒng chéngdù éryǐ. Méishénme zhídé dàjīngxiǎoguài de.
|vo_13_01_tl         = It's only this level. Not worthy of making a big fuss.

|vo_13_02_title_s    = 突破的感受・承
|vo_13_02_title_t    = 突破的感受・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings about Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx_s       = 新的力量？这力量，也只会被用于斩杀。
|vo_13_02_tx_t       = 新的力量？這力量，也只會被用於斬殺。
|vo_13_02_rm         = Xīn de lìliàng? Zhè lìliàng, yě zhǐ huì bèi yòng yú zhǎn shā.
|vo_13_02_tl         = New power? This power will only be used for killing.

|vo_13_03_title_s    = 突破的感受・转
|vo_13_03_title_t    = 突破的感受・轉
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings about Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx_s       = 力量的尽头，是自我毁灭。回答我，为何如此执着呢？
|vo_13_03_tx_t       = 力量的盡頭，是自我毀滅。回答我，為何如此執著呢？
|vo_13_03_rm         = Lìliàng de jìntóu, shì zìwǒ huǐmiè. Huídá wǒ, wèihé rúcǐ zhízhuó ne?
|vo_13_03_tl         = This power ends in self-destruction. Answer me, why do you persist like this?

|vo_13_04_title_s    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_title_t    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings about Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx_s       = 我的枪缨，早就屠戮了无尽的怨魂。连我本人，不免也被黑暗吞噬。&mdash;&mdash;你却敢于驱使这样的我，将我当作…「同伴」。<br />…你是想要救赎我吗？…你，真是难以理解的生物。
|vo_13_04_tx_t       = 我的槍纓，早就屠戮了無盡的怨魂。連我本人，不免也被黑暗吞噬。&mdash;&mdash;{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}卻敢於驅使這樣的我，將我當作…「同伴」。<br />…{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}是想要救贖我嗎？…{{MC|你|妳|mc=1}}，真是難以理解的生物。
|vo_13_04_rm         = Wǒ de qiāngyīng, zǎo jiù túlùle wújìn de yuàn hún. Lián wǒ běnrén, bùmiǎn yě bèi hēi'àn tūnshì. {{lmdash}}Nǐ què gǎn yú qūshǐ zhèyàng de wǒ, jiāng wǒ dàng zuò... "tóngbàn".<br />...Nǐ shì xiǎng yào jiùshú wǒ ma? ...Nǐ, zhēn shì nányǐ lǐjiě de shēngwù.
|vo_13_04_tl         = My polearm has already slaughtered an endless amount of restless souls. Even I myself have inevitably been engulfed by darkness. Yet you dare urge on even this form of me, treating me as... a "companion."<br />...Do you wish to save me? ...You, really are an incomprehensible being.
}}
